channel.title: A lil help if you dont mind?
channel.description:
ok i just download silabasofts client. and i extracted it ect. and i got the client.jar on my desktop now when i click it nothing comes up absoulty nothing its realy weired i just wanted to know why there maby a reward if some 1 can help i can run mopar fine and i did the variables thing ill show you also what happens when i do the run.bat aswell [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/3846/67781122bv9.jpg[/img][/URL]
i am not a java/mopar expert as you can see? but a lil please

item.title: A lil help if you dont mind?
item.dc:creator: @xdarkxshadwox xdarkxshadwox
item.description:
@xdarkxshadwox wrote:

OMFg thank you both guys !!! I wub you <3 Ill rep you when i can

Read full topic

item.title: A lil help if you dont mind?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

xdarkxshadwox:

Good for you i just want help iam going to try maby i can pm you? IF i need help …??

Dark, open the .rar or the .zip which contains the client files, and highlight them both and extract to the same folder… then try to run the .bat it should read the .jar then and work fine. If you can run moparscape then one can only assume you have the correct version of Java.

Read full topic

@sonjichan wrote:

I was asking him where his .bat was… I can run the client fine if you were referring to me not knowing anything about it… If you look on his desktop it appears the run.bat isn’t in the same directory as the .jar so it can’t find it when compiling.
